message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Its value is undeniable, and I believe it can significantly benefit you.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.  This is a rare opportunity to own something truly special.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but I believe my initial offer was already quite fair. The value this product brings is undeniable. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to adjust my offer slightly to $1,325,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1,250,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget.
